name: TaskPenguin
0:
”Alexa, ask Task Penguin how many tasks do I have”
”Create a new task buy milk”
”What tasks do I have”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: task penguin
des: Task Penguin is a simple to use To-Do/Task list where you can store items for access at any time. If you are going to want that list away from your Echo, simply ask Alexa for the list of tasks and have the completed list sent as a card to your app.
